etymologies: late 16th century: from French, from Italian tarocchi, of unknown origin

definitions: playing cards, traditionally a pack of 78 with five suits, used for fortune-telling and (especially in Europe) in certain games. The suits are typically swords, cups, coins (or pentacles), batons (or wands), and a permanent suit of trump

examples.text: tarot is a powerful way of revealing the truth about your life

shortDefinitions: playing cards used for fortune-telling and in certain games

definitions: a card game played with tarot cards.
shortDefinitions: card game played with tarot cards
card from pack of tarot cards
